apps.linear.postfix
Class StatusKeeper

java.lang.Object
  apps.linear.postfix.StatusKeeper

 class StatusKeeper
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements a status tracker that stores the portion of an expression that has been processed so far. It is only visible in its package.

Author:
Sesh Venugopal

          Buffer in which status is stored.

          Initializes a new instance to empty (clear) status.
